item.title: 车用固态电池第 1 部分国标拟于 7 月发布
item.guid: 车用固态电池第-1-部分国标拟于-7-月发布
item.description:
According to Cailian Press, Wang Fang, chief scientist at China Automotive Technology and Research Center (CATARC), recently stated at an industry conference that the GB/T "Solid-State Batteries for Electric Vehicles Part 1: Terms and Classification" draft for comments was completed in December 2025, with the public comment period extending until February 28, 2026. 据财联社报道，中汽中心首席科学家王芳近日在某行业会议上表示，GB/T《电动汽车用固态电池第 1 部分：术语和分类》已于 2025 年 12 月完成征求意见稿编制工作，征求意见期至 2026 年 2 月 28 日。

It is reported that this national standard will clarify the definitions of terms such as liquid batteries, hybrid solid-liquid batteries (semi-solid-state batteries), and solid-state batteries (all-solid-state batteries). 据悉， 该国标将明确液态电池、混合固液电池（半固态电池）、固态电池（全固态电池）术语定义等。

The report points out that CATARC will organize verification tests in January-February 2026 to further improve test methods and confirm evaluation indicators; it is expected to be reviewed and approved in April 2026, and officially released in July. 报道指出，中汽中心将于 2026 年 1 月-2 月组织开展验证测试，进一步完善测试方法，确认判定指标；预计 2026 年 4 月审查和报批，7 月正式发布。

According to our inquiry, the "Solid-State Batteries for Electric Vehicles Part 1: Terms and Classification" is currently available on the National Standard Information Public Service Platform. 而据我们查询发现，目前《电动汽车用固态电池第 1 部分：术语和分类》已上线全国标准信息公共服务平台。

The content shows that the main drafting units are China Automotive Technology and Research Center Co., Ltd., Contemporary Amperex Technology Co., Limited (CATL), Hefei Guoxuan High-Tech Power Energy Co., Ltd., and others. 内容显示，主要起草单位为中国汽车技术研究中心有限公司 、宁德时代新能源科技股份有限公司 、合肥国轩高科动力能源有限公司等 。

item.title: 我国完成首次载人飞船返回舱海上搜索回收任务
item.guid: 我国完成首次载人飞船返回舱海上搜索回收任务
item.description:
According to Xinhua News Agency, on February 11, during the low-altitude demonstration and verification of the Long March 10 carrier rocket system and the maximum dynamic pressure escape flight test of the Mengzhou manned spacecraft system, the Mengzhou manned spacecraft successfully performed a maximum dynamic pressure escape and safely splashed down at sea. 据新华社报道，2 月 11 日，在长征十号运载火箭系统低空演示验证与梦舟载人飞船系统最大动压逃逸飞行试验中，梦舟载人飞船成功实施最大动压逃逸并在海上安全溅落。

At 12:20 on the 11th, the maritime search and rescue team completed the capsule search and recovery mission. This marks China's first manned spacecraft search and recovery mission conducted at sea , accumulating important experience for subsequent space station application and development missions and manned lunar landing missions. 11 日 12 时 20 分，海上搜救分队完成返回舱搜索回收任务。 这是我国首次在海上实施载人飞船搜索回收任务 ，为后续空间站应用与发展任务和载人登月任务积累了重要经验。

The report states that this test is another developmental flight test organized after tests such as the Long March 10 carrier rocket tethered ignition, Mengzhou manned spacecraft zero-altitude escape flight, and the comprehensive verification of the Lanyue lander's landing and takeoff, marking an important phased breakthrough in China's manned lunar exploration project development. 报道介绍，这次试验是继长征十号运载火箭系留点火、梦舟载人飞船零高度逃逸飞行、揽月着陆器着陆起飞综合验证等试验后，组织实施的又一项研制性飞行试验，标志着我国载人月球探测工程研制工作取得重要阶段性突破。

According to the China Manned Space Agency, this test features many highlights, including a new type of rocket, a new type of spacecraft, a new launch pad, and new tasks for sea recovery of rockets and spacecraft. Both the participating rocket and spacecraft were in their prototype state. 据中国载人航天工程办公室介绍，这次试验具有新型号火箭、新型号飞船、新发射工位，以及火箭、飞船海上回收新任务等诸多亮点，参加试验的火箭和飞船均为初样状态。

Among them, the rocket adopted a single-stage core stage configuration and underwent two tethered ignition tests previously; the spacecraft's re-entry capsule previously underwent a zero-altitude escape flight test. 其中，火箭采用芯一级单级构型，前期进行了两次系留点火试验；飞船返回舱前期进行了零高度逃逸飞行试验。

To conduct this test, all participating products underwent adaptive modifications in accordance with reusability requirements and procedures. The Wenchang Space Launch Site overcame various difficulties by adopting a "build while using" strategy to ensure the test was carried out as scheduled. The landing site system conducted targeted training and drills focusing on the technical challenges of the spacecraft's re-entry capsule's first sea splashdown and recovery. 为开展此次试验，相关参试产品均按照可重复使用要求和流程完成了适应性改造，文昌航天发射场按照边建设边使用的策略克服各种困难确保试验如期实施，着陆场系统围绕飞船返回舱首次海上溅落回收技术难点开展针对性训练和演练。

It is worth mentioning that this test marks the Long March 10 carrier rocket's first ignition flight in its prototype state, China's first spacecraft maximum dynamic pressure escape test, China's first sea splashdown of a manned spacecraft re-entry capsule and rocket first stage, and also the first ignition flight test mission performed by the newly built launch pad at the Wenchang Space Launch Site. 值得一提的是， 这次试验是长征十号运载火箭首次初样状态下的点火飞行，是我国首次飞船最大动压逃逸试验，是我国首次载人飞船返回舱和火箭一级箭体海上溅落，也是文昌航天发射场新建发射工位首次执行点火飞行试验任务。

The success of this test verified the functional performance of the rocket's first-stage ascent and recovery sections, the spacecraft's maximum dynamic pressure escape and recovery, and the compatibility of interfaces across various engineering systems, accumulating valuable flight data and engineering experience for subsequent manned lunar exploration missions. 这次试验成功，验证了火箭一级上升段与回收段飞行、飞船最大动压逃逸与回收的功能性能，验证了工程各系统相关接口的匹配性，为后续载人月球探测任务积累了宝贵飞行数据和工程经验。

item.title: 苹果 AI Siri 再延期：能力大削，或 9 月见
item.guid: 苹果-AI-Siri-再延期：能力大削，或-9-月见
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Apple has adjusted its internal pace, and some features of the new Siri will be postponed until iOS 26.5, or even iOS 27, which will only launch in September , requiring multiple versions to complete its capabilities. 据彭博社报道，苹果内部已调整节奏， 新 Siri 的部分功能将顺延至 iOS 26.5，甚至 9 月才上线的 iOS 27 ， 需要跨越多个版本才能补齐能力。

Regarding the launch schedule, the new Siri was initially promised to be fully implemented by early 2025, then subsequently delayed to iOS 26.4, released in March 2026. However, the engineering team has recently been asked to switch to iOS 26.5 as the primary testing environment. 在上线节奏上，新 Siri 最初承诺于 2025 年初完成落地，随后整体推迟至 2026 年 3 月发布的 iOS 26.4。但近期，工程团队已被要求改用 iOS 26.5 作为主要测试环境。

From an overall planning perspective, Apple is splitting the Siri updates, originally concentrated in a single version, into multiple segments. Some features are expected to land in iOS 26.5 in May, while the rest will be further moved to iOS 27: 从整体规划看，苹果正将原本集中在单一版本中的 Siri 更新拆分成多段，部分功能预计落在 5 月的 iOS 26.5，其余继续后移至 iOS 27：

    In the current testing phase, the new Siri has revealed several shortcomings, including unstable understanding of voice requests, excessively long response times, and a tendency to fail in complex command scenarios. Testers also reported that Siri would interrupt commands midway if the user spoke slightly faster, leading to a very poor testing experience;

    The "deep personal data invocation" capability, originally considered a killer feature, is being significantly weakened. This feature allows Siri to directly retrieve information from personal content like messages and invoke corresponding app functions. However, in the internal version of iOS 26.5, it only exists as a "preview" that requires manual activation, indicating that the experience is not yet mature;

    Another capability that has been slow to progress is advanced voice control based on App Intents, aiming to complete multi-step in-app operations with a single sentence, such as finding, editing, and sending images. This mechanism has been launched in the internal testing system, but its stability is insufficient;

    It is worth noting that the internal versions of iOS 26.4 and 26.5 also include two unreleased new capabilities: web search Q&A and image generation. The former is similar to Perplexity, capable of integrating web information and providing summaries and links; the latter is developed based on Tu Leyuan (Image Paradise), but current test results are not satisfactory;

    For iOS 27, iPadOS 27, and macOS 27, Apple is internally advancing a project codenamed "Campo," aiming to transform Siri into a more chatbot-like system-level AI entry point, deeply integrated with core applications such as Mail, Calendar, and Safari;

It is reported that a significant reason for the slow progress of Siri's upgrade is Apple's strong stance on privacy. Apple insists on performing inference as much as possible on the device, or only using servers with privacy protection mechanisms, and avoiding direct use of real user data for training. This conflicts with the working principles of LLM models. 据悉， Siri 升级推进缓慢的一个重要背景，是苹果对隐私的强硬立场。 苹果坚持尽量在设备端完成推理，或仅使用具备隐私保护机制的服务器，并避免直接利用用户真实数据进行训练。而这与 LLM 模型的工作原理有所冲突。

On the computing power side, Cook recently told internals that Apple Silicon is being used to build data center solutions customized for Apple devices. This cloud AI chip project, codenamed Baltra, will be used to support subsequent heavier Siri and generative AI tasks. 在算力侧，库克近期对内部表示，Apple Silicon 正在用于构建专为苹果设备定制的数据中心解决方案。这个代号为 Baltra 的云端 AI 芯片项目，将用于支撑后续更重型的 Siri 与生成式 AI 任务。

Clearly, Apple does not want the new Siri project to drag past the critical spring 2026 deadline, but the reality is that AI Siri's troubles continue, and currently, Apple has no better solution. 显然，苹果不希望新 Siri 项目拖过 2026 年春季这一关键时间节点，但现实是，AI Siri 的麻烦还在继续，而目前来看，苹果也没有更好的解决方案。

item.title: 48 小时不到，xAI 两名联创宣布离职
item.guid: 48-小时不到，xAI-两名联创宣布离职
item.description:
According to Jiemian News and public information, two co-founders of xAI – Wu Yuhuai (Tony Wu) and Jimmy Ba – announced their departures on the 10th and 11th, respectively. 据界面新闻及公开信息显示，xAI 两名联合创始人——吴宇怀（Tony Wu）和吉米 · 巴（Jimmy Ba）分别在 10 号和 11 号分别宣布离职。

On February 10, Wu Yuhuai posted on social media announcing his departure from xAI, expressing his fondness for the company and gratitude to all colleagues, as well as thanking Musk for his "trust in the mission." 2 月 10 日，吴宇怀在社媒上发帖宣布从 xAI 公司离职，他表达了对这家公司的怀念和感谢全体同事，同时也感谢马斯克对「使命的信任」。

Although Wu Yuhuai did not disclose his future plans, he mentioned, "It's time to start my next chapter. This is an era full of possibilities: a small team equipped with AI can move mountains and redefine possibilities." 虽然吴宇怀未透露未来去向，但他提及「是时候开启我的下一章了，这是一个充满可能性的时代：一个配备 AI 的小团队可以移山倒海，重新定义可能性。」

Information shows that Wu Yuhuai was a key figure at xAI in the fields of mathematical reasoning and symbolic AI. During last year's Grok-3 model launch livestream, he sat next to Musk as a core researcher, and the model was hailed by Musk as "the smartest AI on Earth." 信息显示，吴宇怀是 xAI 在数学推理和符号 AI 领域的核心人物。在去年 Grok-3 模型发布直播中，他作为核心研究者坐在马斯克身旁，该模型被马斯克誉为「地球上最聪明的人工智能」。

It is reported that before Wu Yuhuai's departure, xAI underwent an organizational restructuring, and several of his work responsibilities were transferred to Guodong Zhang (transliteration). 据悉，在吴宇怀离职前，xAI 曾进行架构调整，其多项工作职权已划归至张国栋（Guodong Zhang，音译）名下。

Public information shows that Guodong Zhang is a core team member of xAI, primarily responsible for machine learning optimization and training. Previously, his team was dedicated to building Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) and open-sourcing the Grok series of large models. Before joining xAI, his professional experience included top institutions such as Microsoft Research Asia, Google Brain, and DeepMind. 公开信息显示，张国栋是 xAI 核心团队成员，主要负责机器学习优化与训练工作，此前其所在团队致力于构建人工通用智能（AGI）并开源大模型 Grok 系列，加入 xAI 前，其职业经历覆盖微软亚洲研究院、谷歌大脑、DeepMind 等顶尖机构。

On February 11, Jimmy Ba posted an announcement stating that he had left Musk's startup on Tuesday local time. 2 月 11 日，吉米 · 巴发文宣布表示，他已于当地时间周二离开马斯克的这家初创公司。

Jimmy Ba stated in his post, "It's time to recalibrate my cognitive gradient of the big picture. 2026 will be extraordinary, likely the busiest (and most decisive) year for the future of humanity." 吉米 · 巴在文中表示：「是时候重新校准我对大局的认知梯度了。2026 年将会非同寻常，很可能是关乎人类未来最忙碌（也最具决定性）的一年。」

At the same time, he also expressed gratitude to Musk, mentioning his privilege to co-found xAI during its early stages, cherishing this extraordinary journey of working together, and pledging to maintain close ties with the company as a team friend in the future. 同时，他也向马斯克表达了感谢，提及自己有幸在 xAI 初创阶段参与联合创立，珍惜这段非凡的共事旅程，并承诺未来将以团队挚友的身份与公司保持紧密联系。

It is reported that Jimmy Ba held a key position, reporting directly to Musk and overseeing most of the company's business operations. However, by the end of last year, several of his core responsibilities had been split and transferred to two other co-founders, Wu Yuhuai and Guodong Zhang. 据悉，吉米 · 巴曾身居要职，直接向马斯克汇报工作，负责公司大部分业务运营。不过在去年年底，其多项核心职责已被拆分，移交至另外两位联合创始人吴宇怀与张国栋手中。

According to xAI's organizational chart from early last year, he was also responsible for managing a team of over a thousand AI mentors, a responsibility that was taken over by Diego Pasini in September last year. 据去年年初的 xAI 组织架构图，他还曾负责管理一支超千名 AI 导师的团队，该职权也在去年 9 月由迭戈·帕西尼（Diego Pasini）接任。

Additionally, Tesla Vice President Raj Jegannathan also recently announced his departure. 另外，特斯拉副总裁 Raj Jegannathan 也在近期宣布离职。

Raj Jegannathan mentioned in his post that his 13-year career is hard to explain in a single article, but his journey at Tesla was a process of continuous evolution— Raj Jegannathan 在文中提到，自己 13 年的职业生涯很难一文讲清楚，但在特斯拉的旅程是一段持续进化的过程——

From the technical details of designing, building, and operating the world's largest AI cluster, to making impactful contributions in IT, security, sales, and service, it was an honor to serve.

item.title: 腾讯×特斯拉：上线微信互联与目的地地服务
item.guid: 腾讯×特斯拉：上线微信互联与目的地地服务
item.description:
Recently, Tencent and Tesla jointly upgraded the owner's cockpit, launching two major functions: "WeChat Interconnect" and "Destination Services." 近日，腾讯与特斯拉共同升级车主座舱，上线「微信互联」、「目的地服务」两大功能。

It is reported that these two major functions leverage Tencent's ecosystem and technological advantages to jointly create a seamless, intelligent, and convenient new cockpit experience. This feature launch will cover over a million Model 3 and Model Y vehicles in the domestic market via OTA updates, and will be pre-installed in all new cars subsequently. 据悉，两大功能依托腾讯生态与技术优势，共同打造无缝连接、智能便捷的座舱新体验。本次功能上线将通过 OTA 方式，覆盖国内市场超百万辆 Model3、Model Y 车型，后续将在全量新车中默认搭载。

The WeChat Interconnect function is based on Tencent's travel connectivity capabilities, enabling seamless location transfer between mobile phones and in-car systems. Users can share location cards from WeChat conversations, or POI information from various sources like Tencent Maps, Baidu Maps, Gaode Maps, with one click to the Tesla in-car system and directly initiate navigation. 微信互联功能基于腾讯随行互连能力，打通手机与车机间的位置流转。 用户可将微信对话中的位置卡片，或来自腾讯地图、百度地图、高德地图等多种来源的 POI 信息，一键分享至特斯拉车机并直接发起导航。

Destination Services provide an intelligent experience centered around travel scenarios. When users navigate to specific destinations such as cafes, restaurants, or scenic spots, the system will intelligently trigger nearby services, supporting the activation of merchant mini-programs via mobile push notifications or passenger scanning, enabling convenient operations like immediate ordering and ticket booking. 目的地服务围绕出行场景提供智能化体验。当用户导航抵达咖啡厅、餐厅或景区等特定目的地时，系统将智能触发周边服务，支持通过手机推送或副驾扫码唤起商家小程序，实现即停即点、预约购票等便捷操作。

In the future, more functions will be launched successively, helping users enjoy a more convenient and smarter travel life. 未来，更多功能将陆续上线，助力用户享受更便捷、更智慧的出行生活。

item.title: 豆包、蚂蚁阿福加入春节红包大战
item.guid: 豆包、蚂蚁阿福加入春节红包大战
item.description:
Following Yuanbao's red envelope distribution and Qianwen's milk tea invitations, Ant Afu and Doubao have also recently launched their Spring Festival red envelope activities: 继元宝派红包、千问请喝奶茶之后，蚂蚁阿福以及豆包也在近期开启了春节红包活动：

    Ant Afu: New registered users who come to Afu between February 11th and February 12th can receive a 16.8 yuan Alipay red envelope.

    Doubao: On the evening of Lunar New Year's Eve, February 16th, it will deliver over 100,000 tech gifts and Spring Festival cash red envelopes up to 8,888 yuan to national audiences through the CCTV Spring Festival Gala.

Previously, Tencent Yuanbao announced the distribution of 1 billion Spring Festival red envelopes; Alibaba's Qianwen launched "Treat Guests to Share 3 Billion," offering users free milk tea, coffee, and meal orders. 此前，腾讯元宝宣布派发 10 亿新春红包；阿里千问则推出「请客瓜分 30 亿」，为用户进行奶茶、咖啡、订餐免单。

item.title: 消息称字节跳动正研发 AI 芯片
item.guid: 消息称字节跳动正研发-AI-芯片
item.description:
According to Reuters, ByteDance is advancing its self-developed AI chips and is in talks with Samsung for foundry services and component supply, with the core aim of ensuring the supply of AI computing power for its own needs. 据路透社消息，字节跳动正在推进自研 AI 芯片，并与三星洽谈代工与配套供货，核心目的就是给自家 AI 算力「保供」。

The report, citing informed sources, states that ByteDance is developing an AI chip codenamed "SeedChip," primarily for inference tasks, and is negotiating manufacturing cooperation with Samsung. The goal is to obtain samples by the end of March, with plans to mass-produce at least 100,000 units this year, potentially increasing to 350,000 units subsequently. 报道引知情人士称，字节在开发代号「SeedChip」的 AI 芯片，主要面向推理（inference）任务，并与三星就制造合作进行谈判。 目标是 3 月底前拿样片，今年计划量产至少 10 万颗，后续或逐步拉升至 35 万颗。

In response to the news, a ByteDance spokesperson told Reuters that information about the self-developed chip project was "inaccurate" but did not elaborate further; Samsung declined to comment. 针对该消息，字节跳动方面发言人向路透社回应称，自研芯片项目信息「不准确」，但未继续就此展开说明；三星方面，则对此不予置评。

The report also mentioned that ByteDance's AI-related procurement budget this year might exceed 160 billion yuan, with more than half still allocated for purchasing Nvidia chips (including H200), while continuing to advance its self-developed chips. 报道还提到字节今年 AI 相关采购预算或超 1600 亿元人民币，其中一半以上仍会用于购买英伟达芯片（含 H200），同时继续推进自研芯片。

Recently, with the viral success of the Seedance 2.0 model, although the platform stated that attention exceeded expectations and has paused real-person material references, in fact, this type of high-quality "audio-visual synchronized" video generation will drive up the demand for inference computing power. 最近，随着 Seedance 2.0 模型的火爆出圈，虽然平台称关注超预期并已暂停真人素材参考，但事实上这类「音画同步」的高质量视频生成会把推理算力需求拉高。

ByteDance's increased procurement and self-developed chips seem more like an effort to secure critical supply, reserve capacity for peak computing power, and reduce reliance on a single supply chain. 字节加码采购与自研芯片，更像是在锁定关键供给、给峰值算力留余量，同时降低对单一供应链的依赖。

item.title: 马斯克：要在月球建厂生产 AI 卫星
item.guid: 马斯克：要在月球建厂生产-AI-卫星
item.description:
According to The New York Times, Elon Musk stated at an xAI all-hands meeting on February 10th local time that the company needs to build a factory on the moon to manufacture AI satellites and equip it with a giant catapult to launch them into space. 据《纽约时报》消息，马斯克于当地时间 2 月 10 日的 xAI 全员大会上表示，公司需要在月球上建造一座工厂来制造 AI 卫星，并配备一个巨大的弹射器将其发射到太空。

The report noted that Musk declared "We must go to the moon" at the meeting. He stated that this move would help xAI lead other companies and enable it to build its AI facilities more powerfully. 报道指出，马斯克在会议上喊出「必须去月球」。其表示， 此举将帮助 xAI 领先其他公司，并且能够更强大地构建其 AI 设施。

Musk also added, "It's hard to imagine what that scale of intelligence would think, but it's incredibly exciting to see it happen." 马斯克还补充表示「很难想象那种规模的智能会思考什么，但看到这一切发生将令人无比兴奋。」

Recently, xAI and SpaceX just announced a merger to advance plans for building AI data centers in outer space. Musk then posted: 近期，xAI 与 SpaceX 刚宣布合并，以推动在外太空建设 AI 数据中心的计划。随后马斯克发文表示：

SpaceX has shifted its focus to building a self-sustaining city on the moon, as we might achieve it in less than 10 years, whereas Mars would take more than 20 years.

Musk pointed out that planets only align every 26 months (six months travel time), and only then is it possible to go to Mars. "Whereas we can launch to the moon every 10 days (two days travel time). This means we can iterate and build a lunar city much faster than a Martian city." 马斯克指出，每 26 个月（六个月旅行时间）行星才会对齐，那时才有可能去火星。「而我们可以每 10 天发射一次去月球（两天旅行时间）。这意味着我们迭代建造月球城市比火星城市要快得多。」

He also stated that SpaceX will also strive to build a Martian city, and plans to start implementation in about 5 to 7 years, but the top priority is to ensure the future of civilization, and the moon offers a faster path. 其还表示，SpaceX 也将努力建造一个火星城市，并大约在 5 到 7 年内开始实施，但首要任务是确保文明的未来，而月球则更快。

item.title: 可接 OpenClaw！Rokid Glasses 上线自定义智能体
item.guid: 可接-OpenClaw！Rokid-Glasses-上线自定义智能体
item.description:
On February 11, Rokid announced that the Lingzhu platform for its Rokid Glasses officially launched the "Custom AI Agent" feature. 2 月 11 日，Rokid 乐奇宣布，其 Rokid Glasses 的灵珠平台正式上线「自定义智能体」功能。

According to the official introduction, users can connect Rokid Glasses to any desired backend via standard SSE (Server-Sent Events) interfaces, enabling private deployment of OpenClaw, DeepSeek R1, Qwen3, Kimi K2.5, and more. 官方介绍，用户可以通过标准的 SSE（Server-Sent Events）接口，将 Rokid Glasses 接入任何想要的后端，能够私有部署 OpenClaw、DeepSeek R1、Qwen3、Kimi K2.5 等。

According to Rokid, Rokid Glasses combined with OpenClaw can achieve: 据 Rokid 介绍，Rokid Glasses 配合 OpenClaw 可以实现：

    Privacy Data Sovereignty: By connecting to locally deployed agents (such as OpenClaw running on a Mac Mini or home server), users' camera footage, private knowledge bases, and personal memories are processed directly in a local closed loop;

    More Powerful Personal Assistant Capabilities: OpenClaw, through ClawHub's skill ecosystem, can invoke file systems, operate browsers, send IM messages, and even execute Python scripts;

    Completely Free Large Model Base: Utilize Kimi K2.5's long-thinking capability (Thinking Mode) to tackle complex reasoning, or deploy a locally quantized version of Qwen 3 to enjoy fully local, on-device interaction.

Rokid stated that Rokid Glasses are responsible for "seeing" and "hearing," while OpenClaw is responsible for "thinking" and "executing," and this is the ultimate form of AR. Rokid 表示，Rokid Glasses 负责「看」和「听」，OpenClaw 负责「思考」和「执行」，而这才是 AR 的终极形态。

item.title: 于东来宣布「过年后正式退休」
item.guid: 于东来宣布「过年后正式退休」
item.description:
According to a message from Henan Daily's WeChat official account, on February 11, Pang Donglai founder Yu Donglai posted on social media announcing his official retirement after the Chinese New Year, transitioning to an advisory role, with Pang Donglai's operations to be presided over by the Pang Donglai Decision-Making Committee. 据河南日报微信公众号消息，2 月 11 日，胖东来创始人于东来在社交平台发文宣布，过年后正式退休，将转为顾问，胖东来工作由胖东来决策委员会主持。

Yu Donglai mentioned in his article, "I am sixty years old. For a scientific and advanced development model, and to let young people bravely take on the mission, I will officially retire after the Chinese New Year and transition to an advisory role , with Pang Donglai's operations to be presided over by the Pang Donglai Decision-Making Committee." 于东来文中提到，「自己六十岁了，为了科学先进的发展模式，让年轻人勇敢承担使命， 过年后正式退休，转为顾问 ，胖东来工作由胖东来决策委员会主持」。

At the same time, Yu Donglai also pointed out, "Firmly committed to the beauty of the country and society, and firmly inspiring more people to live easy and happy lives... I believe it will definitely be even better!" 同时于东来也指出，「坚定为国家和社会的美好、坚定启迪更多人们轻松快乐的生活………相信一定会更加美好！」

It is reported that in 2025, Pang Donglai's total sales exceeded 23.531 billion yuan. Among them, the supermarket format occupied the core C position, with sales reaching 12.643 billion yuan, the jewelry format sales reached 2.451 billion yuan, and annual tea sales were 1.063 billion yuan. 据悉，2025 年胖东来合计销售额超 235.31 亿元。其中，超市业态占据核心 C 位，销售额达到 126.43 亿元，珠宝业态销量额达到 24.51 亿元，茶叶全年销量为 10.63 亿元。

item.title: 💡 Jony Ive：触屏不适合用作汽车的主要交互
item.guid: 💡-Jony-Ive：触屏不适合用作汽车的主要交互
item.description:
Recently, Ferrari officially unveiled the interior design of its first pure electric model, "Luce." The vehicle's interior features multiple physical buttons and allows for functions such as air conditioning and seat heating adjustments. 日前，法拉利正式公布了其首款纯电车型「Luce」的内饰设计，该车型内饰采用了多个实体按键，并且能进行空调、座椅加热等功能调节。

It is reported that the design of Luce involved the LoveFrom team led by Apple's former Chief Design Officer, Jony Ive. 据悉，Luce 的设计由苹果前首席设计官 Jony Ive 带队的 LoveFrom 团队参与。

Jony Ive recently also revealed his thoughts on in-car central control interaction: touchscreens are not suitable for use as the primary interaction in cars. 而 Jony Ive 近期也透露了自己对于车辆中控交互的想法： 触屏不适合用作汽车的主要交互。

Jony Ive mentioned that using a touchscreen while driving causes the driver's eyes to leave the road, which is why touchscreens are not suitable as the primary interaction interface technology. Jony Ive 提到，在行驶中使用触摸屏，会导致驾驶者的视线离开道路，而这也是为什么，触控屏不适合作为主要交互界面的技术。

At the same time, Jony Ive also suggested that the tactile feel of each physical button is different, so it's possible to operate them blindly without looking. 同时 Jony Ive 也提出，每一个实体按键的操作手感都会有所不同，因此不需要看，也能实现盲操。

When asked by a reporter, "Then why does the iPhone use touch control?", Jony Ive directly stated, "Because the core idea behind developing the iPhone at the time was to create a universal interface that could display any scenario (such as a computer, keyboard, camera)." 当被记者问到「那为什么 iPhone 采用触控」时，Jony Ive 则直接表示「因为当时开发 iPhone 的核心思想是开发一个通用界面，它可以显示任何场景（如计算机、键盘、相机）」。

I believe that the way we design car interiors is not about trying to solve problems (referring to designing a universal interface) in the same way we designed the iPhone. 我认为设计汽车内饰的方式并不是像我们设计 iPhone 那样试图解决问题（指设计通用界面）。

item.title: 智谱上线全新模型 GLM-5
item.guid: 智谱上线全新模型-GLM-5
item.description:
Just now, Zhipu officially launched and open-sourced its latest model, GLM-5. 刚刚，智谱正式上线并开源最新模型 GLM-5。

According to reports, GLM-5 is a product of moving towards Agentic Engineering: in terms of Coding and Agent capabilities, it has achieved open-source SOTA performance, with a user experience in real programming scenarios approaching Claude Opus 4.5, excelling in complex system engineering and long-range Agent tasks. 据介绍，GLM-5 是迈向 Agentic Engineering 的产物：在 Coding 与 Agent 能力上，其取得开源 SOTA 表现，在真实编程场景的使用体感逼近 Claude Opus 4.5，擅长复杂系统工程与长程 Agent 任务。

GLM-5 adopts a brand new base: parameter scale expanded from 355B (active 32B) to 744B (active 40B), pre-training data increased from 23T to 28.5T ; a new "Slime" framework is built to support larger model scales and more complex reinforcement learning tasks. GLM-5 采用全新基座： 参数规模从 355B（激活 32B）扩展至 744B（激活 40B），预训练数据从 23T 提升至 28.5T ；构建全新的「Slime」框架，支持更大模型规模及更复杂的强化学习任务。

At the same time, GLM-5 also integrates DeepSeek Sparse Attention for the first time , significantly reducing model deployment costs while maintaining lossless long-text effects. 同时， GLM-5 还首次集成 DeepSeek Sparse Attention（稀疏注意力） ，在维持长文本效果无损的同时，大幅降低模型部署成本。

In terms of specific performance: 具体表现上：

    In the globally authoritative Artificial Analysis rankings, GLM-5 ranks fourth globally and first among open-source models.

    GLM-5 has achieved alignment with Claude Opus 4.5 in programming capabilities, achieving open-source model SOTA in industry-recognized mainstream benchmark tests.

    GLM-5 achieved the highest open-source model scores of 77.8 and 56.2 in SWE-bench-Verified and Terminal Bench 2.0 respectively, outperforming Gemini 3 Pro.

    GLM-5 achieved top performance in BrowseComp (network retrieval and information understanding), MCP-Atlas (large-scale end-to-end tool invocation), and τ²-Bench (tool planning and execution for autonomous agents in complex scenarios).

It is worth mentioning that GLM-5 has completed deep inference adaptation with domestic computing platforms such as Huawei Ascend, Moore Threads, Cambricon, Kunlunxin, Muxi, Biren, and Hygon. Through underlying operator optimization and hardware acceleration, GLM-5 has achieved stable operation with high throughput and low latency on domestic chip clusters. 值得一提的是，目前 GLM-5 已完成与华为昇腾、摩尔线程、寒武纪、昆仑芯、沐曦、燧原、海光等国产算力平台的深度推理适配。通过底层算子优化与硬件加速，GLM-5 在国产芯片集群上已经实现高吞吐、低延迟的稳定运行。

Effective immediately, GLM-5 is open-sourced simultaneously on Hugging Face and ModelScope platforms, with model weights adhering to the MIT License. Additionally, GLM-5 has been included in the GLM Coding Plan Max package. 即日起，GLM-5 在 Hugging Face 与 ModelScope 平台同步开源，模型权重遵循 MIT License。同时 GLM-5 已纳入 GLM Coding Plan Max 套餐。

item.title: 模型春节大战已悄悄开启
item.guid: 模型春节大战已悄悄开启
item.description:
We have observed that DeepSeek has recently been quietly updated. 据我们观察发现，DeepSeek 近期悄悄更新了。

When you turn off the deep thinking and internet search functions and ask DeepSeek about its context length and knowledge cutoff date, if it replies that it is 1M (previously 128k) and the knowledge cutoff date is May 2025, this indicates that it has entered the new version's grayscale release range. 当关闭深度思考和联网搜索功能，向 DeepSeek 询问上下文长度和知识库截止日期， 如果它回复自己是 1M（此前为 128k）以及知识库截止日期为 2025 年 5 月，而这也说明已进入新版本灰度范围。

However, as of now, this version has not yet enabled multimodal capabilities. 不过，截至目前，该版本仍未开放多模态能力。

Earlier, the South China Morning Post quoted sources as saying that DeepSeek is more likely to launch minor updates to its V3 series models during the Spring Festival. However, the source also revealed that the real highlight is still on the way: 早前，《南华早报》援引知情人士消息称，DeepSeek 春节更可能推出的是针对 V3 系列模型的小幅更新。但该人士同时透露，真正的重头戏仍在路上：

DeepSeek's next-generation flagship model is expected to be a trillion-parameter foundational model. Due to the significant leap in scale, training speed has slowed down considerably, leading to a delay in the release process.

Furthermore, we have observed that MiniMax Agent has now launched the latest MiniMax-M2.5 text model, which supports optional use. 另据我们观察发现， 目前 MiniMax Agent 已上线了最新 MiniMax-M2.5 文本模型，并且支持选择使用。

Currently, there is no further information. 目前暂无更多其他信息。

item.title: 三星 Galaxy S26 系列有望月底发布
item.guid: 三星-Galaxy-S26-系列有望月底发布
item.description:
Yesterday, Samsung's official website formally announced that it will hold a Galaxy global new product launch event at 2 AM on February 26, 2026, where it is expected to unveil new products such as the Samsung Galaxy S26 series phones and Galaxy Buds 4 series earbuds. 昨天，三星官网正式宣布，将于 2026 年 2 月 26 日凌晨 2 点举行 Galaxy 全球新品发布会，预计将会发布三星 Galaxy S26 系列新机、Galaxy Buds 4 系列耳机等产品。

Judging from the released teaser video, the Galaxy S26 series is expected to feature three new models. Combining previous information, the Galaxy S26 series will offer the S26, S26+, and S26 Ultra. 从公布的预热视频来看，本次 Galaxy S26 系列预计会有三款新机。结合此前信息来看，Galaxy S26 系列将会提供 S26、S26+ 和 S26 Ultra。

According to currently leaked information, all three new phones will adopt a rear camera module design similar to the Z Fold 7, and will feature a flat front and back with a flat-edged frame. 目前曝光的信息来看，三款新机都将采用类似 Z Fold 7 的后置相机模组设计，并且均为前后直板+直边中框。

It's worth noting that the new phones will offer a brand-new hardware-level screen privacy feature. This feature is said to achieve pixel-level privacy protection through nanoscale optical control and supports full-screen privacy mode activation. 值得一提的是，新机能够提供全新的硬件级屏幕防窥功能。据悉该功能将通过纳米级光学调控实现像素级防窥，并且支持全屏开启隐私模式。

In terms of performance, the S26 series may adopt a dual-platform strategy, with some regions using the Exynos 2600 processor (the world's first 2nm process chip); among them, the S26 Ultra is also expected to upgrade to 60W wired fast charging. 性能方面，S26 系列或采用双平台策略，部分地区采用 Exynos 2600 处理器（全球首款 2nm 制程芯片）；其中 S26 Ultra 还有望升级 60W 有线快充。

item.title: 纯电汉兰达上线，同步家族式设计
item.guid: 纯电汉兰达上线，同步家族式设计
item.description:
Yesterday, Toyota unveiled the all-new pure electric Highlander, positioned as a mid-to-large SUV. 昨天，丰田公布全新纯电版汉兰达，定位中大型 SUV。

In terms of exterior, the pure electric Highlander adopts Toyota's latest C-shaped daytime running light design, with straighter and more rigid body lines; the floating A-pillar has been changed to an all-black roof design; and the taillights have been redesigned as a continuous light strip. 外观方面，纯电版汉兰达采用丰田最新 C 字型日间行车灯设计，整车线条更加笔直硬朗；悬浮式 A 柱改为全黑车顶设计；尾灯改为贯穿式灯带设计。

The overall vehicle dimensions have increased: the body length reaches 5m, the wheelbase has increased to 3m, the width has evolved to 1.98m, while the body height has decreased to 1.7m. 整车尺寸增大：车身长度达 5m，轴距增加至 3m，车宽也进化到了 1.98m，同时车身高度下降至 1.7m。

The new car will offer both front-wheel drive and all-wheel drive versions, and will have two battery options: 77 kWh and 95.8 kWh, providing a maximum range of 514 kilometers (320 miles). 新车将提供前驱以及四驱两个版本，并且拥有 77 度和 95.8 度两个版本电池选择，最高提供 514 公里（320 英里）续航。

For the interior, the new car adopts a 6-seat layout, with the second row supporting electric recline; it is equipped with a 14-inch central control screen (offering 5G network) and a 12.3-inch instrument cluster, and the front row features double-layer laminated glass. Notably, the pure electric Highlander comes with a built-in dashcam. 内饰方面，新车采用 6 座布局，其中第二排支持电动放倒；配备 14 英寸中控屏幕（提供 5G 网络）以及 12.3 英寸仪表盘，前排配备双层夹胶玻璃。值得一提的是，纯电汉兰达自带行车记录仪。

item.title: 蚂蚁开源全模态大模型 Ming-Flash-Omni 2.0
item.guid: 蚂蚁开源全模态大模型-Ming-Flash-Omni-2.0
item.description:
On February 11, Ant Group open-sourced and released the full-modal large model Ming-Flash-Omni 2.0. 2 月 11 日，蚂蚁集团开源发布全模态大模型 Ming-Flash-Omni 2.0。

In multiple public benchmark tests, Ming-Flash-Omni 2.0 demonstrated outstanding performance in key capabilities such as visual language understanding, controllable speech generation, and image generation and editing, with some metrics surpassing Gemini 2.5 Pro, setting a new benchmark for open-source full-modal large models. 在多项公开基准测试中，Ming-Flash-Omni 2.0 在视觉语言理解、语音可控生成、图像生成与编辑等关键能力表现突出，部分指标超越 Gemini 2.5 Pro，成为开源全模态大模型性能新标杆。

It is reported that Ming-Flash-Omni 2.0 is also the industry's first unified audio generation model for all scenarios , capable of simultaneously generating speech, environmental sound effects, and music within the same audio track. Users can precisely control timbre, speech rate, intonation, volume, emotion, and dialect simply by giving instructions in natural language. 据悉，Ming-Flash-Omni 2.0 也是 业界首个全场景音频统一生成模型 ，可在同一条音轨中同时生成语音、环境音效与音乐。用户只需用自然语言下指令，即可对音色、语速、语调、音量、情绪与方言等进行精细控制。

During the inference stage, the model achieved an extremely low inference frame rate of 3.1Hz, enabling real-time high-fidelity generation of minute-long audio, maintaining industry leadership in inference efficiency and cost control. 模型在推理阶段实现了 3.1Hz 的极低推理帧率，实现了分钟级长音频的实时高保真生成，在推理效率与成本控制上保持业界领先。

It is worth mentioning that Ming-Flash-Omni 2.0 is trained based on the Ling-2.0 architecture (MoE, 100B-A6B), and has been comprehensively optimized around three major goals: 'seeing more accurately, hearing more finely, and generating more stably'. 值得一提的是，Ming-Flash-Omni 2.0 基于 Ling-2.0 架构（MoE，100B-A6B）训练，围绕「看得更准、听得更细、生成更稳」三大目标全面优化。

Currently, the model weights and inference code for Ming-Flash-Omni 2.0 have been released on open-source communities such as Hugging Face. Users can also experience and call it online through Ant Bailin's official platform, Ling Studio. 目前，Ming-Flash-Omni 2.0 的模型权重、推理代码已在 Hugging Face 等开源社区发布。用户也可通过蚂蚁百灵官方平台 Ling Studio 在线体验与调用。

item.title: UU 跑腿下架「代拜年」服务
item.guid: UU-跑腿下架「代拜年」服务
item.description:
Recently, UU Paotui launched a service called 'New Year Greetings Delivery', which offers 'greeting elders on behalf of others and kowtowing on behalf of others', with the highest package priced at 999 yuan, sparking heated discussion. 日前，UU 跑腿推出一项名为「新春带拜年」的服务，其中提供「代拜长辈代磕头」，最高套餐售价 999 元，并引发热议。

Yesterday, UU Paotui responded to the aforementioned service. 昨日，UU 跑腿方面对于上述服务进行了回应。

The platform stated that the original intention behind launching such services was to meet the specific needs of groups who are unable to return home for New Year greetings, such as those living in different places, with mobility issues, or overseas. They hope that through these services, they can help them convey their care and intentions, make up for the regret of not being able to greet in person, and provide better emotional value. 平台方面表示， 其推出相关服务的初衷，是为了满足身在异地、行动不便或海外等无法返乡拜年群体的特定需求。希望通过此类服务，帮助他们传递牵挂与心意，弥补无法当面问候的遗憾，提供更好的情绪价值。

UU Paotui stated that the 'New Year Greetings Delivery' service is not a blasphemy or misinterpretation of traditional etiquette. At the same time, the platform stated: UU 跑腿方面表示，「新春带拜年」服务并非对传统礼仪的亵渎与曲解。同时平台表示：

To maintain a positive, healthy, and harmonious online public opinion environment and avoid unnecessary misunderstandings and conflicts caused by commercial innovation, we have, after careful evaluation, voluntarily removed the controversial service items. For orders that cannot be fulfilled due to the delisting, we will proactively provide users with three times the compensation amount, refunded via the original payment method. Thank you for your understanding.

At the same time, UU Paotui also proposed that, based on interesting demands raised by netizens (such as 'on-duty proxy', 'blind date proxy', 'pet care proxy', 'shift care for elderly in hospitals', etc.), they will research and list these services as soon as possible after evaluation, to help more users in need. 同时，UU 跑腿还提出，根据网友所提出的有趣需求（如「代值班」「代相亲」「代照顾宠物」「换班照顾医院老人」等服务），他们也将在评估后尽快研究上架，帮助更多有需求的用户。

Additionally, UU Paotui also announced that it will officially launch the 'Enjoy a Peaceful New Year's Eve Dinner' Spring Festival charity event, giving back to society with concrete actions: 另外，UU 跑腿还表示，其将正式启动「安心吃个年夜饭」春节公益活动，以实际行动回馈社会：

On New Year's Eve, for all frontline workers who remain at their posts and cannot reunite with their families – including public security officers, medical staff, firefighters, sanitation workers, and other groups – the platform will fully waive the delivery fees for related courier orders placed by their families to deliver New Year's Eve dinners to them (the couriers' income will not be affected).

item.title: 微博公布「2025 热搜趋势报告」
item.guid: 微博公布「2025-热搜趋势报告」
item.description:
Yesterday, Weibo Hot Search released the full version of the '2025 Weibo Hot Search Trend Report'. 昨日，微博热搜发布了「2025 微博热搜趋势报告」完整版。

According to the report, 'National Games', 'Nezha movie goes viral', 'AI wave', and 'Gaokao' all made it onto the 'Top Ten Events'; in the hot search 'keywords' ranking, 'response' appeared the most times, while content such as 'Lei Jun', 'Nezha', 'concert', 'Xiaomi', and 'mobile phone' were also included. 据报告显示，「全运会」「电影哪吒出圈」「AI 浪潮」「高考」均有登上「十大事件」；而热搜「关键词」排名中，「回应」上榜次数最多，同时「雷军」「哪吒」「演唱会」「小米」「手机」等内容也在内。

It is worth mentioning that artificial intelligence and robots almost dominated the keywords for emerging field attention trends, with DeepSeek appearing the most times. 值得一提的是，人工智能以及机器人几乎包揽了新兴领域关注趋势的关键词，其中 DeepSeek 上榜次数最多。

item.title: 米哈游宣布「解雇」公司常年法律顾问
item.guid: 米哈游宣布「解雇」公司常年法律顾问
item.description:
On February 11, miHoYo's legal department issued a 'Statement on Terminating Cooperation with Shanghai Huiye Law Firm', announcing: 2 月 11 日，米哈游法务部发布《关于终止与上海市汇业律师事务所合作的声明》，宣布：

All cooperation with its former perennial legal counsel, Huiye Law Firm, has been terminated, and it will no longer be entrusted to handle any legal matters related to miHoYo. Furthermore, Shanghai Huiye Law Firm has been permanently blacklisted as a company partner, with no future cooperation. 终止与原常年法律顾问汇业律所的一切合作关系，停止委托其处理任何与米哈游相关的法律事务，同时将上海市汇业律师事务所永久列入公司合作方黑名单，永不合作。

According to miHoYo's information: 据米哈游方面信息：

Previously, miHoYo appointed Shanghai Huiye Law Firm as its perennial legal counsel to provide litigation legal services. During the period when Huiye Law Firm provided legal services to miHoYo, Lawyer Zhou Kaichang, a member of Huiye Law Firm's management committee and a senior partner, despite knowing that representing Envision Company in a litigation case (Envision Energy Co., Ltd. vs. miHoYo Network Infringement Liability Dispute Case) involved a conflict of interest, still privately carried out actions beyond the scope of the legal counsel contract with Envision Company, specifically assigning intern lawyer Wu to continue helping Envision Company collect and secure litigation evidence and providing it to Envision Company, which is suspected of violating relevant provisions of the 'Lawyer Law'.

miHoYo stated that regarding Zhou Kaichang's actions, it had filed a complaint with the Xuhui District Justice Bureau of Shanghai. After the Xuhui District Justice Bureau initiated an investigation, the bureau has lawfully imposed administrative penalties on Zhou Kaichang. 米哈游表示，针对周开畅的行为，其已向上海市徐汇区司法局提出投诉。经徐汇区司法局立案调查，该局已依法对周开畅作出行政处罚。

Furthermore, Envision Energy Co., Ltd. has applied to the Jiangyin City People's Court to withdraw its aforementioned lawsuit against miHoYo regarding the network infringement liability dispute, and the Jiangyin City People's Court has ruled to permit the withdrawal. 此外，远景能源有限公司已向江阴市人民法院申请撤回前述其与米哈游之间网络侵权责任纠纷案件的起诉，江阴市人民法院已裁定准许其撤诉。

It is reported that Envision Energy had sued miHoYo in June last year because a villain in 'Zenless Zone Zero' was named 'Envision Industry', and miHoYo counter-sued for commercial defamation. 据悉，远景能源曾于去年 6 月，因《绝区零》反派叫「远景实业」将米哈游告上法庭，后者反向起诉商业诋毁。

item.title: 元宝新玩法：可在「元宝派」畅享看 NBA 全明星赛
item.guid: 元宝新玩法：可在「元宝派」畅享看-NBA-全明星赛
item.description:
On February 11, Tencent announced that Yuanbaopai officially launched the 'Watch NBA All-Star Game Together' special event, including four key battles: the Celebrity Game, Rising Stars Challenge, Skills Challenge, and the All-Star Game itself. 2 月 11 日，腾讯宣布，元宝派正式上线「一起看 NBA 全明星赛」专题活动，包括名人赛、新秀赛、单项赛及全明星正赛四场焦点战役。

From February 14 to 16, users can enter any Yuanbaopai, click the [+] button below, and watch the 2026 NBA All-Star Game with friends, support real-time discussion of the game situation by @Yuanbao within the group, and enjoy a 1080P high-definition live broadcast experience. 2 月 14 日至 16 日，用户进入任意元宝派，点击下方的【+号】按钮，即可与派友一起看 2026 年 NBA 全明星赛，并支持在派内 @元宝 实时讨论赛况，还可畅享 1080P 高清直播体验。

It is understood that this event deeply integrates Tencent Sports' high-quality content resources. In addition to high-definition live broadcast benefits, Yuanbaopai has also innovatively incorporated AI interactive gameplay. "Yuanbao" will transform into an all-around "football expert," allowing users to @Yuanbao in the group at any time to discuss player data, inquire about match rules, or conduct in-depth tactical analysis. 据了解，此次活动深度整合了腾讯体育的高品质内容资源，除了高清直播福利，元宝派还创新性地融入了 AI 互动玩法，「元宝」将化身全能「懂球帝」，用户可随时在群内 @元宝，实时探讨球员数据、查询赛事规则或进行深度的战术解析。

Currently, Yuanbaopai's "Listen Together, Watch Together" feature has integrated QQ Music and Tencent Video with two major high-quality content libraries. 目前，元宝派「一起听、一起看」功能，打通了 QQ 音乐和腾讯视频与两大优质内容库。

item.title: 杨紫琼主演，短片《Sandiwara》发布预告
item.guid: 杨紫琼主演，短片《Sandiwara》发布预告
item.description:
According to Sina Film, the trailer for the short film "Sandiwara," starring Michelle Yeoh and directed by Sean Baker, has been released. 据新浪电影消息，杨紫琼主演，肖恩·贝克导演短片《Sandiwara》发布预告。

Michelle Yeoh plays five roles: video blogger, commentator, hawker, waiter, and singer. Set in a bustling night market in Penang, Malaysia, the story focuses on local culture, humanity, and life. 杨紫琼一人饰五个角色：视频播主、评论人、摊贩、侍者和歌手，设定在马来西亚槟城的夜市里，热闹之中的故事，聚焦当地文化、人文和人生。

It is reported that the film will premiere at the "Berlin Film Festival," where Michelle Yeoh will also be awarded the Lifetime Achievement Award. 据悉，该片即将在「柏林电影节」首映，杨紫琼也将在本届柏林获颁终身成就奖。

item.title: 动画电影《八仙！》定档今年暑期
item.guid: 动画电影《八仙！》定档今年暑期
item.description:
Yesterday, the divine comedy animated film "The Eight Immortals!" was set for release in the summer of 2026 and unveiled its "Crossing the Sea Under False Pretenses" teaser poster. 昨日，神仙喜剧动画电影《八仙！》定档 2026 年暑期并发布「瞒天过海」版先导海报。

It is reported that the story revolves around eight ordinary people from humble backgrounds who, facing powerful villainous deities, cleverly maneuver with wit and folk wisdom, ultimately being praised by the world as "The Eight Immortals." 据悉，故事围绕八个出身草根的凡人展开，他们面对强大的反派神仙，凭借机智与民间智慧巧妙周旋，最终被世人赞颂为「八仙」。

The film is produced by Oriental DreamWorks and CMC Pictures, directed by Mou Zhengyang, and innovatively interprets this classic legend with a comedic style and a youthful approach. 影片由东方梦工厂及华人影业出品，牟正洋执导，以喜剧风格和年轻化创新演绎这一经典传说。
